page.title: 13CLUBS
page.content: {The clubroom}was built in memory of Countess Somers.The building was opened on December 2nd 1912 ,but on June 3rd 1939,the building was completely destroyed by fire.The new clubroom was the old village laundry. { The cricket pitch}is used for all the village sports.The local football team play there and Eastnor cricket team.The field is owned by the Estate and there is a small pavilion so people can watch a game of football or cricket.A new pavilion was built in 1983 for the cricketers.It has two rooms and is used for cricket teas. { Landrover trials}are held up in the park.People from all over the world come to take part.The trials go on for three days.Some of the landrover people stay at the castle.There is a {bowling green}in the deer park. .
